mapper.select: select b.*,m.memname,p.* from board b, member m, picture p,(select boardnum,cnt from (SELECT boardNum, COUNT(EMOEXPRESS) as cnt,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY count(EMOEXPRESS) DESC) AS RANK FROM EMOTION GROUP BY boardNum) where rank <=3) a where a.boardnum=b.boardnum and m.memnum=b.memnum and a.boardnum = p.postnum and p.picclass='c'

select * from fund join member using(memnum) where fundnum in (select fundnum from ( SELECT fundnum, COUNT(paynum),ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY count(paynum) DESC ) AS RANK FROM payment GROUP BY fundnum) where rank <=3)
